email.accountConfirm.subject: Welcome to LFG!
email.accountConfirm.body: There's just one more step before! To be able to login you need to confirm your account by clicking the button above.
email.accountConfirm.body2: This link is only valid for 48h
email.accountConfirm.alternativeLink: If the link above does not work, use this one
email.accountConfirm.accountConfirmed: Account confirmed. You can now close this tab and login
